list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who cuts hair, especially men's, and shaves or trims beards as an occupation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he had his hair cut at the local barber's
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta bị cắt tóc tại thợ cắt tóc địa phương
Tóc anh ta được cắt tỉa gọn gàng
